attributes.additional_details:
Police seem ineffectual in both number and strategy, please can you defend the law abiding citizens of this country buy taking back control of the streets, if needed with water cannons, if needed with the army.

How many peoples lives must be ruined, how many people must be hurt, for you to act.

When I called the police to report our street being attacked last night, they asked me, "we know but what do you want us do about it."
